mapper.insert: insert into project (projectCode, projectName, writerId, likeList, regDate, updateDate) values (#{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{writerId}, "", now(), now())
mapper.update: update project set projectName = #{projectName}, likeList = #{likeList}, updateDate = now() where projectCode = #{projectCode}
mapper.select: select * from project order by projectCode desc, regDate desc
